org.mt4j.input
Interface IMTInputEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponentProcessor, AbstractCursorProcessor, AbstractShape, AbstractVisibleComponent, AngelCodeFontCharacter, ArcballProcessor, Cluster, Cluster3DExt, ComponentInputProcessorSupport, DragProcessor, FlickProcessor, LassoProcessor, MTCanvas, MTClipRectangle, MTClipRoundRect, MTColorPicker, MTComponent, MTCSSStylableShape, MTCube, MTEllipse, MTImageButton, MTLine, MTList, MTListCell, MTOverlayContainer, MTPolygon, MTProgressBar, MTRectangle, MTRoundRectangle, MTSlider, MTSphere, MTStencilPolygon, MTTextArea, MTTriangleMesh, MTWindow, MultipleDragProcessor, PanProcessorTwoFingers, Rotate3DProcessor, RotateProcessor, ScaleProcessor, TapAndHoldProcessor, TapProcessor, UnistrokeProcessor, ZoomProcessor
public interface IMTInputEventListener

The listener interface for receiving IMTInputEvent events. The class that is interested in processing a IMTInputEvent event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addIMTInputEventListener method. When the IMTInputEvent event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
See Also:
MTInputEvent
